inclusion.criterion: Patient must give written informed consent before registration.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Locally advanced or metastatic, histologically confirmed breast adenocarcinoma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: requiring therapy and not suitable for local treatment.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Stratum A: endocrine responsive-HER2neg BC, specifically: ERpos (≥1%), PRpos
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Presence of ≥1 measurable or evaluable lesion according to RECIST 1.1.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Tumor assessment to be performed within 28 days before or on registration.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate hematological values: hemoglobin ≥100 g/L, ANC ≥1.5x10^9/L, platelets
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Adequate hepatic function: total bilirubin ≤1.5xULN, ALT ≤2.5xULN (except for liver metastases ≤5xULN).
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Previous malignancy within 5 years with the exception of adequately treated cervical carcinoma in situ or localized non-melanoma skin cancer.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Uncontrolled central nervous system (CNS) metastases, pulmonary carcinomatous lymphangiosis (i.e., >50% invasion), or liver metastases on >1/3 of the liver on ultrasound or computed tomography (CT).
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 42 year-old postmenopausal woman with locally advanced breast adenocarcinoma, requiring therapy and not suitable for local treatment. She has adequate hematological values, hepatic function, and renal function.
